root.title: Contact BearStudio
root.description: We are at your service regarding any complementary information or business inquiry! A member of our team will gladly answer to you as soon as possible.

metadata.title: Contact the BearStudio team in Rouen, France
metadata.description: Your next CTO or development team is probably based in Rouen. Contact us to discuss about your project.

application-process.title: What to do to join us?
application-process.description: If you want your shot at joining BearStudio and to become a teddy bear, read this page! #RTFM

metadata.title: The BearStudio application process
metadata.description: At BearStudio, there is only one way to apply. On this page you can find out how to join the bear den.
